page.title: 16BRISTOL ZOO
page.content: {Bristol Zoo} is on the edge of { {Clifton Down}. It was founded in 1836. The zoo has 12 acres of magnificent grounds full of plants , animals and many beautiful floral displays. Altogether there are over 1000 species of mammals , birds and reptiles . Every year , Bristol Zoo has more than 1/2 million visitors . It costs thousands of pounds to run the zoo weekly . In the centre of the zoo there is a delightful lake surrounded by trees . Ther are several species of bird that swim on the lake . Other attractions include the white tigers and a brand new reptile house and monkey enclosure Personally , we think Bristol Zoo is a nice place for people of all ages , and it makes a lovely day out for all the family . We really enjoy going to Bristol Zoo .
